title: Integrated Food-Energy-Water Systems (FEW-Nexus) Education: Interdisciplinary Collaboration Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science and Social Science Concepts Understanding, Basic STEM Literacy
context.additional_context: Conducting interdisciplinary collaborative projects analyzing the interconnections of FEW (Food-Energy-Water) systems within language curriculum contexts

learning_goals: Learners can create a conceptual map explaining the core concepts and interdependencies of FEW systems.
Learners can design and execute virtual team projects to solve FEW problems using interdisciplinary collaboration tools.
Learners can critically analyze FEW-related policy/technical materials through digital platforms and reconstruct them into linguistic expressions.
Learners can propose community engagement strategies from a FEW-Nexus perspective in an LMS-based discussion forum.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
